(standard input):7:moo 7 0  pet
(standard input):8:meow 7 0 pet
(standard input)-9-bark 7 dog
--
(standard input)-12-
(standard input):13:2 8 pet
(standard input)-14-10 5 2 3
--
(standard input)-18-lala 8 -1 .*
(standard input):19:2 3 42 pet
